- [Русский](https://docs.codescoring.ru/dependencies/ruby/index.md)

# Working with dependencies in Ruby

## Bundler

### Creating a `Gemfile.lock` file

1. Initialize the project:

   ```
   bundle init
   ```

1. Install dependencies:

   ```
   bundle install
   ```

   or create a lock-file directly:

   ```
   bundle lock
   ```
